page.title: 07HEALTH
page.content: Most people have good health.In Bovey Tracey we have a health centre. It's opening times are between 9.30 _ 11.30 and 3.15 _ 5.30. There are 4 doctors and several other people _ receptionists, nurses, midwives and social workers who are there to help you. The doctors may send you to Torbay or Newton Abbot hospital first and then later to Bovey Tracey hospital.Bovey tracey hospital has a twenty _ four hour minor casualty facility. The wards are now quite up to date with new modern hydraulic beds. The hospital has 5 wards, a physiotheraphy room, a television lounge and a kitchen. Hawkmoor hosital is for the mentally handicapped. It is going to close in 4 years so that the people can go into smaller more personal community units.
